name: Spirit lands post jam
description:
The project
Post jam version of Spirit lands.
Spirit lands was my entry for the PPJJGG. I was not able to finish it all in time.
The game has received some polish from the jam version.

Controls
Arrow keys: Move left/right and aim up/down Z: Jump, press Z mid-air do make a small double jump X: Shoot

Idea 
Your goal is to finish 2 levels and reach the throne to win. If you die on the way your spirit will leave its mark on the world in the next rounds, this can be anything from reshaping that part of the level, adding more enemies or dropping bonus items! Your spirit name is displayed at the bottom. At the top you see which area you're in. All starting areas are "wastelands" until a spirit takes over that space.

Enjoy!
